about_the_game:
Each sacrifice reshapes you, forging a hero uniquely tailored by the trials they've survived.

Awaken in a desolate prison, stripped of all strength and forgotten powers. As shadows of your past loom, a singular resolve ignites within you: the need to gain power.

What will you sacrifice to gain it!

Venture through cursed dungeons, discovering that your failures are not setbacks but stepping stones to greater power. In this bizarre world of formidable foes and twisted weapons, your defeats lay the foundation for ultimate victory. Embrace the relentless cycle of rebirth, and carve your path to triumph in a realm ensnared by apocalypse.

  • A Big World for a Dungeon Crawl

    Explore seven huge dungeons in colorful Khorasan, packed with gorgeous art, epic loot, and of course, baddies to beat up!

  • No Hero is an Island

    Bring up to three friends along for the adventure in 4-player online and couch co-op!

  • Brawl with the Best

    Battle your way through massive hordes of enemies before facing off against intimidating bosses that test just how powerful you think you are!

  • They’re Kind of Cute

    Make pets out of the various beasts around Khorasan, and team up as they go with you into battle!

  • The Endless Quest for Power

    Upgrade your stats! Upgrade your gear! Upgrade your skills! Upgrade your town! Ah what the heck, upgrade your pet too! Run out of upgrades? Be reborn to reset your level while keeping your skills and go upgrade some more!
detailed_description:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400); AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3800)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti (1024 VRAM); Radeon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2048 VRAM); Radeon R9 380 (2048 VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12

  • Sound Card: Any
